last_episode_to_air.name: Paula
last_episode_to_air.overview: In a highly emotional case, Bob and Tina visit a woman in Rhode Island who's been forced out of her new home by a dark, heavy presence. They must move fast to help their terrified client take back her home and banish the entity once and for all

name: Ghost Bait
overview: A paranormal pioneer and empathic investigator help victims of the most severe hauntings in America reclaim their sense of peace and control.

episodes.name: Agnes
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina travel to the historic Brookdale Lodge in Santa Cruz, CA, to investigate claims of an evil spirit bullying an employee. The woman must overcome her deepest fears and confront the oppressive entity to save her livelihood.

episodes.name: Jason and Nina
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina head to Monongahela, PA, to investigate claims of paranormal activity terrorizing a young couple in their new home. As a last resort, the homeowners are forced to confront their fear of the demonic entity in order to reclaim their house.

episodes.name: Michael and Barbie
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina travel to northern California to investigate claims of multiple entities tormenting a couple in their own home. With their relationship at stake, they must work together to face their fears and stand up to the malicious spirits. The entire investigation is put into jeopardy after the camera crew is viciously attacked during a late night walk-through.

episodes.name: Ashley
episodes.overview: A woman in Sacramento, CA, reaches out to Bob and Tina to investigate an aggressive presence terrorizing her family home. With no other options, the homeowner must confront her fears and reconcile with the spirit or leave her childhood home behind.

episodes.name: Dee
episodes.overview: A frightened employee at a Sacramento, CA, costume shop reaches out to Bob and Tina with claims that a shadow man is stalking her. In order to reclaim her space, she must confront the spirit in the most terrifying place possible -- the basement.

episodes.name: Sara
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina travel to Spring Hill, PA, to validate claims of a ghost targeting women at a local brewery. Their client must confront the evil spirit on her own to reclaim her power.

episodes.name: Kaitlyn
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina investigate claims of cheerleaders being terrorized by ghosts at a community center in Rumford, Maine. In order to save the cheerleading program, the coach must face her fears and stand up to the vicious spirits haunting the property.

episodes.name: Sonya
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina get a call from a Georgia family experiencing paranormal activity linked to a nearby construction site where human remains have been uncovered. To save her family, the mom must take a stand against the evil that's been dug up.

episodes.name: Emma and Kelly
episodes.overview: A concerned family calls Bob and Tina to their Massachusetts home to investigate a terrifying entity residing in the children's bedroom. The mother and daughter are placed in two different locations of the house in order to confront their biggest fears.

episodes.name: Taylor and Tucker
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina travel to a family-owned restaurant in Georgia to investigate claims of a disembodied spirit terrorizing a young boy. The future of the family business depends on the boy's willingness to face his fear of the Severed Man.

episodes.name: John
episodes.overview: Bob and Tina travel to Georgia to meet with a man who has been tortured by multiple entities on his property, leading his family to abandon him. The client must face his fears one-on-one to reclaim his home and win back his family.

episodes.name: Paula
episodes.overview: In a highly emotional case, Bob and Tina visit a woman in Rhode Island who's been forced out of her new home by a dark, heavy presence. They must move fast to help their terrified client take back her home and banish the entity once and for all
